french_cakes.name: Tarte Tatin
french_cakes.recipe: Tarte Tatin is an upside-down caramelized apple tart made with puff pastry. It is baked in a skillet and then inverted before serving.

french_cakes.name: Éclair
french_cakes.recipe: Éclair is a pastry made of choux dough filled with cream and topped with icing. It is known for its elongated shape.

french_cakes.name: Opera Cake
french_cakes.recipe: Opera Cake is a French cake made with layers of almond sponge cake soaked in coffee syrup, layered with ganache and coffee buttercream, and covered in a chocolate glaze.

french_cakes.name: Mille-Feuille
french_cakes.recipe: Mille-Feuille, also known as a Napoleon, is a pastry made of layers of puff pastry and cream filling, usually flavored with vanilla.

french_cakes.name: Croquembouche
french_cakes.recipe: Croquembouche is a tower of cream-filled profiteroles (choux pastry balls) bound together with threads of caramel.

french_cakes.name: Galette des Rois
french_cakes.recipe: Galette des Rois, or King Cake, is a puff pastry cake traditionally eaten in France on Epiphany. It is often filled with almond cream.

french_cakes.name: Tarte au Citron
french_cakes.recipe: Tarte au Citron is a lemon tart made with a pastry crust and a creamy, tart lemon filling.

french_cakes.name: Baba au Rhum
french_cakes.recipe: Baba au Rhum is a small yeast cake saturated in rum, usually served with whipped cream or fruit.

french_cakes.name: Madeleine
french_cakes.recipe: Madeleine is a small, shell-shaped sponge cake. It is a traditional French pastry.

french_cakes.name: Pithivier
french_cakes.recipe: Pithivier is a round, enclosed pie filled with almond paste and usually topped with puff pastry.

french_cakes.name: Charlotte
french_cakes.recipe: Charlotte is a dessert made with ladyfingers or sponge cake that is lined with a mold, filled with fruit and custard, and chilled.

french_cakes.name: Gateau Basque
french_cakes.recipe: Gateau Basque is a traditional cake from the Basque region of France, typically filled with cherry jam or pastry cream.

french_cakes.name: Fraisier
french_cakes.recipe: Fraisier is a French strawberry cake made of layers of sponge cake, fresh strawberries, and cream.

french_cakes.name: Breton Butter Cake (Kouign-Amann)
french_cakes.recipe: Kouign-Amann is a round crusty cake, made with bread dough containing layers of butter and sugar folded in, similar in fashion to puff pastry.

french_cakes.name: Bûche de Noël
french_cakes.recipe: Bûche de Noël, or Yule Log, is a traditional Christmas cake made of sponge cake and buttercream, shaped to resemble a log.

french_cakes.name: Far Breton
french_cakes.recipe: Far Breton is a traditional dessert from Brittany made with a custard-like batter and prunes.

french_cakes.name: Canelé
french_cakes.recipe: Canelé is a small French pastry flavored with rum and vanilla with a soft and tender custard center and a dark, thick caramelized crust.

french_cakes.name: Tarte Bourdaloue
french_cakes.recipe: Tarte Bourdaloue is a French tart made with pears and almond cream.

french_cakes.name: Pain Perdu
french_cakes.recipe: Pain Perdu, or French toast, is a dish made of sliced bread soaked in eggs and milk, then fried.

french_cakes.name: Quatre-Quarts
french_cakes.recipe: Quatre-Quarts, or Pound Cake, is a traditional French cake made with equal parts of butter, sugar, eggs, and flour.

french_cakes.name: Paris-Brest
french_cakes.recipe: Paris-Brest is a French dessert, made of choux pastry and a praline flavored cream.

french_cakes.name: Galette Bretonne
french_cakes.recipe: Galette Bretonne is a buttery shortbread cookie from Brittany, France, often flavored with a hint of salt.

french_cakes.name: Fondant au Chocolat
french_cakes.recipe: Fondant au Chocolat is a rich and dense chocolate cake with a gooey, molten center.

french_cakes.name: Tarte Normande
french_cakes.recipe: Tarte Normande is a French tart made with apples and a custard-like filling.

french_cakes.name: Clafoutis
french_cakes.recipe: Clafoutis is a French dessert made with cherries arranged in a buttered dish and covered with a thick flan-like batter.

french_cakes.name: Brioche
french_cakes.recipe: Brioche is a buttery, rich, and tender French bread. It is often used to make sweet pastries.

french_cakes.name: Tarte Tropézienne
french_cakes.recipe: Tarte Tropézienne is a cream-filled pastry originating from Saint-Tropez, made of a brioche-like bread and a cream filling.

french_cakes.name: Saint-Honoré
french_cakes.recipe: Saint-Honoré is a French dessert pastry, named for the French patron saint of bakers and pastry chefs, Saint Honoré.

french_cakes.name: Petit Four
french_cakes.recipe: Petit Four is a small, bite-sized French dessert. It includes a variety of sweet treats like mini cakes, cookies, and pastries.

french_cakes.name: Palmier
french_cakes.recipe: Palmier, also known as elephant ear, is a French pastry in the shape of a palm leaf or an elephant ear.

french_cakes.name: Dacquoise
french_cakes.recipe: Dacquoise is a French dessert cake made with layers of almond and hazelnut meringue and whipped cream or buttercream.

french_cakes.name: Baba Chinois
french_cakes.recipe: Baba Chinois is a Chinese-inspired version of the classic French Baba au Rhum, featuring flavors like lychee and ginger.
